verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in Me And I in you. As the branch cannot Bear fruit of itself Lest it abides in the vine So neither can you Unless you Abide in Me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am the Vine You are the branches He that abides in Me And I in him He bears much fruit For apart from Me You can do Nothing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Weâ€™ll abide in You And You in us We are Your branches, O Lord And we cannot bear fruit Unless we abide in You For You are the vine And so shall we Abide in You.{/lang-eng}
